__e: I remember just being piled in the back of this meat wagon, which was steel, and nothing else inside.
Why did you not make me of steel and stone?
It's stronger than steel and a third the weight.
You got some big balls, pulling that kid off the tracks like that.
And... it wasn't some clunky steel can like we would build.
We can't make steel as good as yours, it's true, but... We're free.
No, you don't understand. Do that and I'll put all eight inches of this in your ear.
[both chuckling] There was more steel in that heroic king's diminished frame than can be found in both your bodies.
